meanings.definition: The process of forming or converting into keratin.
meanings.sent1: The keratinizations of the skin cells help protect our body.
meanings.sent2: The keratinizations of hair and nails make them strong and durable.
meanings.sent3: The scientist joked that the keratinizations of the feathers turned the bird into a walking brush.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to her craft was like the slow but steady keratinizations of a turtle's shell.
meanings.sent5: The gradual keratinizations of the calluses on his hands showed his hard work.

meanings.sent1: The keratinizations of the skin give it a tough outer layer.
meanings.sent2: The keratinizations of the hair follicles result in shiny and healthy hair.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked that his keratinizations were so strong, he could use his nails as tools.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like the unyielding keratinizations of a rhino's horn.
meanings.sent5: The keratinizations of the scales on the reptile's skin provided excellent protection.
